issue_title: [Bug] No validation for negative ID values

test_coverage.notes: Comprehensive test coverage including: direct construction rejection, from_dict rejection, zero ID acceptance, positive ID acceptance

code_quality.notes: Minimal fix following existing patterns, clear error message consistent with project style

minimalism.notes: Single validation check in __post_init__, 2 lines of code added

correctness.notes: Fix addresses all acceptance criteria: rejects negative IDs, accepts zero and positive IDs

maintainability.notes: Validation placed in __post_init__ which is called for both direct construction and from_dict
